sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>tree</radical> <radical>branch</radical> is exactly what it sounds like: the <kanji>branch</kanji> of a tree.
meaningInfo: Picture a tree branch in your hands. Feel it. Smell it. It smells and feels like a tree.
readingMnemonic: Take this <kanji>branch</kanji> and give it to a <reading>shee</reading>p (<ja>し</ja>). Sheep are like dogs, they like to play fetch with tree branches. And now you're playing fetch with this sheep and this branch.
readingInfo: Imagine playing fetch with a tree branch and a sheep. Man's second best friend.
